name: Pack Attack
text: You are skilled at surrounding your enemies.
benefit: When you are adjacent to an ally with this feat, the first time you melee attack an opponent, you can spend an immediate action to take a 5-foot step, even if you have otherwise moved this round.
normal: You can take a 5-foot step only if you have not otherwise moved in a round.
staminaText: When you are adjacent to an ally that also has this feat, you can spend 2 stamina points to take a 5-foot step as a free action instead of an immediate action. You can still use this feat’s ability only once per round.
benefit_zh: 当你发动近战攻击首次命中对手、且和拥有此专长的盟友邻接时，你可以通过直觉动作进行五尺快步，即便你这轮已经移动过位置。
normal_zh: 你只能在没有移动过的状况下使用五尺快步。
staminaText_zh: 当你邻接一个同样拥有这个专长的盟友时，你可以消耗2点耐力以一个自由动作而不是直觉动作来做出5尺快步。你仍然只能在一轮内使用一次这个专长的能力。
